text: Arnis Līcītis (8 January 1946 – 21 January 2022) was a Latvian actor. He was born in Riga, Latvia. His career began in 1965. His best known roles were in Long Road in the Dunes (1981), Musketeers Twenty Years After (1992) and Dangerous Summer (2000). Līcītis died on 21 January 2022 in Riga at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Actors from Riga Category:Latvian movie actors Category:Latvian stage actors Category:Latvian television actors
title: Arnis Līcītis
